channel.title: SevenAtSevenLastSection
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenLastSection, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Marshall Project Announces $1M Challenge Grant From Board Chair Liz Simons to Support Criminal Justice Journalism
item.description: The need for trusted, fact-based reporting has never been more urgent.

item.title: The Best Adaptations To Stream Right Now
item.description: There’s something for every taste, so make some popcorn and park yourself in sofa city for some great adaptations.

item.title: This is the Juiciest, Wildest Story of the Year
item.description: This memoir tells an incendiary story that shocked a reader who already thought the worst of the company and people it blows the whistle on.

item.title: South Carolina Bans 10 More Books From All Public Schools State-Wide
item.description: South Carolina now leads the nation in the number of state-sanctioned book bans. 10 more books must be removed from all public schools in the palmetto...

item.title: Favorite Buys Under $200 – Early Summer Edition
item.description: Outfit Details: Mango Top, Skirt, and Bag, Dolce Vita Flats, Similar Necklace As signs of early summer pick up pace,… The post Favorite Buys Under $20...

item.title: Judge Issues Injunction in Favor of State Attorneys General IMLS Lawsuit
item.description: The judge in the case indicates that the plaintiffs have a strong case and that the actions federal administrators took to dismantle the IMLS may have...
